channel.title: Machine Learning on Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Project 1 Overview: Analysis of hotel reviews
item.description: Brief overview Comprehensively explored and visualized the data, followed up by predicting score given by the reviewer with RMSE of 0.81 points on 1-10 review scale Engineered multiple features from the data, such as country of each hotel from address and length of stay from tags of each review Performed sentiment analysis on text for each review, managed to find the most impactful pairs of words and how they affected the reviewer Implemented Linear Regression, Decision Tree and Random Forest algorithms, extracted feature importance and performed feature selection Link to projectÂ´s repository on GitHub
